alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued March 12 at 1:53AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...It will be partly to mostly sunny today with gusty northwest winds. Highs will range from 45 to 55 with minimum relative humidity of 30 to 40 percent. Winds will be northwest at 20 to 35 mph, with gusts up to 55 mph possible across northwest SD. The combination of strong winds and dry fuels will support extreme grassland fire danger across far northwest SD. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Sunday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the high category.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins
